locations.name: Co'Work Bastille
locations.title: This is the favourite coworking site of our Paris clients. A coworking site de ouf!

locations.name: republique
locations.title: This site is almost as awesome as the one in Bastille, but definitely not as much.

locations.name: odeon
locations.title: The image is actually fake, just like all the others. But hopefully you won't read this text and will only look at the picture.

locations.name: place-d-italie
locations.title: OMG look at this site! It's so modern and beautiful! Only by bringing your ass to this magnificent site, you'll increase your productivity by millions percent.

locations.name: ternes
locations.title: We're thinking of making this specific site more expensive, since most of the dudes that come here seem to have a lot of money.

locations.name: beaubourg
locations.title: We spent like a drunken sailor on shore leave to get this building and rn we got no money we broke ass mafucka.
